name: Violet Bricks
description:
Get into action with Violet Bricks, an exciting puzzle game featuring Violet, a brave heroine who needs to defeat alien robots across dozens of challenging levels. Inspired by classics like Arkanoid, the game features modern 3D graphics and a variety of power-ups to collect.

Developed by Vektro Digital, this is a game that will test your skills and offer plenty of modernized nostalgic fun!


Features:
- Original arts 3d and 2d!
- 10 different power ups!
- Some kinds of bricks and many colours!
